</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Widget to display the individual items of the approval request to the approving user</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>approval_request_items</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link(scope, element, attrs, controller) {  }]]></link><name>Approval Request Items</name><option_schema>[{"name":"requested_items_header","section":"other","default_value":"Requested Items","label":"Related Requested Items Widget Header","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>snc_external,snc_internal</roles><script><![CDATA[(function(){
	var approvalTaskGr;
    data.modalWidgetId = '5736bf52cb30020000f8d856634c9c2d';
    var approvalSysId = $sp.getParameter('sys_id');
    var approvalGr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    approvalGr.get(approvalSysId);
	//In case of manual approval task, document_id field is not set, instead sysapproval field is set
	if (approvalGr.document_id) {
		approvalTaskGr = approvalGr.document_id;
	} else if (approvalGr.sysapproval){
		approvalTaskGr = approvalGr.sysapproval;
	}
		
    if (approvalTaskGr.getRefRecord().getRecordClassName() == 'sc_request') {
        var requestItems = new global.CaseApprovalUtils().getApprovalRequestItems(approvalSysId);
       var requestInfo = {};
       requestInfo['number'] = approvalTaskGr.getRefRecord().number+'';
       requestInfo['sys_id'] = approvalTaskGr.getRefRecord().sys_id+'';
       requestInfo['items'] = requestItems;
       data.request = requestInfo;
   }    
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-09 19:26:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>2c5ef86fc7073300271beb861dc26063</sys_id><sys_mod_count>111</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Approval Request Items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Customer Service Portal Classic" source="com.glide.service-portal.customer-portal">411ff996c3a022109518b11ed401314d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_2c5ef86fc7073300271beb861dc26063</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 04:48:23</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div id="request-items" class="panel panel-primary b" ng-if="c.data.request">

   <div class="panel-body">

</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-02 06:26:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>8483da17c32466109518b11ed40131d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>8883da17c32466109518b11ed40131cf</sys_name><sys_package display_value="New Employee Access Request" source="x_1636309_employ_0">c686c320c30422109518b11ed40131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="New Employee Access Request">c686c320c30422109518b11ed40131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_8483da17c32466109518b11ed40131d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-02 06:26:04</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
